# QobuzApiService.ResetPasswordForEmail method

Requests password reset link for the user with given username address.

```csharp
public QobuzApiStatusResponse ResetPasswordForEmail(string email)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| email | The user's username. |

## Return Value

A QobuzApiStatusResponse indicating if the request succeeded or failed.
